relationships.description: Regular communication about meetings and business contacts
Attempting to arrange a meeting regarding business matters
Stuck at White House during meeting attempt

analysis.purpose: Coordinate meetings with Sultan Bin Sulayem and discuss potential business contacts
analysis.significance: Shows high-level business and political connections, including White House access and international business figures

notable_quotes: I was stuck at the White House and he had a narrow window before heading to Cyprus.
Separately, do you know Oleg Deripaska or Ivan Glasenberg?
red_flags: High-level political and business connections being coordinated through Jeffrey Epstein

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this communication

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced in this communication

public_knowledge.context: Shows Jeffrey Epstein facilitating connections between high-level business figures and someone with White House access

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Jide Zeitlin and Jeffrey Epstein coordinating a meeting with Sultan Bin Sulayem (chairman of Dubai World Ports) and inquiring about connections to Russian oligarch Oleg Deripaska and Glencore CEO Ivan Glasenberg, with Zeitlin mentioning being stuck at the White House and interactions with Nigerian officials.
